tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: South Korea's Own 'Die Hard' Hero, Police Officer*(Kim Hyun-Cheol) Clings to Car(Watch
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: 다이하드 경찰관 마약범 검거장면 Busan police officer Kim Hyun-cheol was hailed a hero after he clung on to the windshield of a fleeing suspect's car for 25 minutes to prevent him from escaping. A Busan police officer has been dubbed "South Korea's own John McClane" after he mimicked the protagonist in the "Die Hard" movies with his heroic, crime-busting antics. Kim Hyun-cheol, a 33-year-old traffic cop, was hailed a hero after he clung on to the windshield of a fleeing suspect's car for 25 minutes to prevent him from escaping last month, CNN reports. His daredevil heroics have earned Kim many fans in his native South Korea after a video documenting the stunt went viral. According to Korea Joongang Daily, Kim had initially stopped the suspect after he saw him making an illegal U-turn in downtown Busan. However, while Kim was writing up a traffic ticket, the man -- who was only identified by his first name Jeong -- stepped on the gas and began to speed off. For the next 25 minutes, the man sped through the streets with the police officer hanging on to the car, his feet lodged at the base of the windshield. "He looked as if he was afraid of something," Kim said later, according to Korea Joongang Daily. "He only opened his window an inch." Finally, the man was forced to stop the car due to traffic and he was arrested while attempting to run away. "I hung on the car persistently because I suspected that he was a criminal," Kim told Korea Joongang Daily. "For the first 10 ...

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Not all.. That's why he is on the news and got the promotion. ﻿ I think this guy's massive heavy balls is what anchored him on top of that van.

unfortunately, cops in Korea aren't allowed to shoot like American cops. if this happened in America, cop would have shot the suspect in the first place, walk over to the suspect, shoot him one more time just to make sure he's down﻿ THEN hand cuff him. AND I'D BE TOTALLY FINE with that because those people who endanger other people's lives on the road don't shouldn't deserve any mercy.
Brave police.﻿ Hope all south korean police is like that. Hope.
I'm just﻿ a cop and I do police work - LIKE A BOSS!!!!!!!!
yeah as if when you shoot him you can always kill him 100%, straight to his﻿ heart or brain.
하마트면 목숨을 잃을 뻔한 상황 이었는데 그 소명의식과 용기에 진심으로 존경을 보냅니다﻿
